data.title: Shane Hurlbut ASC sets up a Cinefade shot
data.meta_description: Shane Hurlbut ASC uses the Cinefade variable depth of field effect on Tall Girl 2 to gradually blur the background in one shot and talks us through his thought process.
data.text:
In this behind the scenes video cinematographer Shane Hurlbut ASC uses the Cinefade variable depth of field effect to gradually blur the background in one shot for dramatic effect.

Jodie struggles with insecurities in feature film Tall Girl 2 and to show the transition of her state-of-mind as her ‘inside voice’ takes over, the visual storytelling tool of a gradual change from shallow to deep depth of field is used to visually communicate the shift.
